job_description: Intern, Software Developer in Testhttps://careercenter.sap.com/sap/bc/bsp/rcfuix/flex_ui_ext/saperecruiting.html?jobId=E4952145CEAB69F1A7AB0050568F01DB#popUps=1;mainView=searchAs market leader in enterprise application software, SAP helps companies of all sizes andindustries run better. From back office to boardroom, warehouse to storefront, desktop to mobiledevice – SAP empowers people and organizations to work together more efficiently and usebusiness insight more effectively to stay ahead of the competition.PURPOSE AND OBJECTIVESHow creative can you be? SAP is ready to challenge your next work term with a role thatcombines development with testing. From the day you own a feature, you will work with testersand developers to find creative ways to hack, break, and demolish that feature and then helprebuild that feature to be better, faster, and stronger!! Your creativity and ingenuity will make thedifference between a happy customer and a satisfied customer.We currently have Software Developer in Test Co-op openings for the following teams:Business Intelligence Platform TeamReporting and Visualization TeamAdvanced Analysis TeamBusiness Intelligence On-Demand TeamThese teams are responsible for releasing our core products including Crystal Reports, SAPBusiness Objects Enterprise, Analysis - OLAP Edition and BI On Demand includingStreamwork. You will either work on client or back end systems.EXPECTATIONS AND TASKSYou need to be…Self motivated and wanting to expand your development knowledge by driving productrobustness.Quick at learning product architecture and feature code so that you can develop the best wayto bend and stretch the features that you will ultimately sign off.Keen on how things work, and devise better ways for them to work.Creative in designing and writing tools to spot problems, isolating problems, and debuggingproblems.… and you will gain:Enhanced communication and technical skills through working closely with ProgramManagers, other Developers and Testers and various other Development Teams.Superior development skill by identifying problems at the source code level, bullet proofingalgorithms, and analyzing source code.The valuable perspective on the do’s and don’ts of a Software Development Professional.With this dual-role work term, you will have gained the creative knowledge of a SoftwareDeveloper plus the perfectionist mind of a Software Tester. Realize that your next work termcould assure that the very next customer experiencing our product will receive maximumproduct quality!
job_requirements: EDUCATION AND QUALIFICATIONS / SKILLS AND COMPETENCIESRequired Skills: Strong programming skills in Java or C++. Understanding of operating systems, databases and web application servers.Desired Skills: Depending on the team, the following are desired skills: Design patterns, webapplication servers configuration, client/server, Linux/Unix, vulnerabilities (Cross Site Scripting,SQL Injection). Web technologies such as XML, JSP, ASP, JavaScript and/or AJAX will be anasset.WORK EXPERIENCEPrevious internship experience would be an asset.Seeking students who can commit to 8 months.Please state on your cover letter and/or resume how long you can commit for.Please upload your unofficial transcript.The expected start date will be scheduled for May 4, 2015Open To All Majors:No

(i.e._driver's_abstract): (i.e. Driver's Abstract):CO-OP NOTE: All students MUST apply via EngCORE as well as through the SAP website in order for your application to be considered. SAP'S DIVERSITY COMMITMENTTo harness the power of innovation, SAP invests in the development of its diverse employees.We aspire to leverage the qualities and appreciate the unique competencies that each personbrings to the company. Company:SAP
